sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
'@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{concat(item().name, '_', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '.parquet')}' as FileName,
'@{activity('act_copy_raw_to_refined').output.rowsRead}' as RawCount,
'@{activity('act_copy_raw_to_refined').output.rowsCopied}' as RefinedCount,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunID,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as ExecutionDate,
'@{activity('act_copy_raw_to_refined').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus

scripts.text:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'data_mssistoragegen2_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [data_mssistoragegen2_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://data@mssistoragegen2.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.contractor_details (
	[name] nvarchar(4000),
	[latlng] nvarchar(4000),
	[text] nvarchar(4000),
	[text1] nvarchar(4000),
	[alphanumeric] nvarchar(4000),
	[guid] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Refined/2023/03/25/contractor_details.csv_20230325.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [data_mssistoragegen2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.laptops (
	[title] nvarchar(4000),
	[price] nvarchar(4000),
	[discount] nvarchar(4000),
	[Processor] nvarchar(4000),
	[RAM] nvarchar(4000),
	[OS] nvarchar(4000),
	[SSD] nvarchar(4000),
	[Display] nvarchar(4000),
	[In_build_sw] nvarchar(4000),
	[warranty] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Refined/2023/03/25/laptops.csv_20230325.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [data_mssistoragegen2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.lineofbusiness (
	[category1] nvarchar(4000),
	[category2] nvarchar(4000),
	[category3] nvarchar(4000),
	[title] nvarchar(4000),
	[productrating] nvarchar(4000),
	[sellingprice] nvarchar(4000),
	[mrp] nvarchar(4000),
	[sellername] nvarchar(4000),
	[sellerrating] nvarchar(4000),
	[description] nvarchar(4000),
	[highlights] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Refined/2023/03/25/lineofbusiness.csv_20230325.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [data_mssistoragegen2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.loan_test (
	[Gender] nvarchar(4000),
	[Married] nvarchar(4000),
	[Dependents] nvarchar(4000),
	[Education] nvarchar(4000),
	[Self_Employed] nvarchar(4000),
	[Applicant_Income] nvarchar(4000),
	[Coapplicant_Income] nvarchar(4000),
	[Loan_Amount] nvarchar(4000),
	[Term] nvarchar(4000),
	[Credit_History] nvarchar(4000),
	[Area] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Refined/2023/03/25/loan_test.csv_20230325.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [data_mssistoragegen2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.mobiles (
	[names] nvarchar(4000),
	[images_links] nvarchar(4000),
	[stars] nvarchar(4000),
	[rating&reviews] nvarchar(4000),
	[price_details] nvarchar(4000),
	[memory] nvarchar(4000),
	[camara_info] nvarchar(4000),
	[display] nvarchar(4000),
	[battery] nvarchar(4000),
	[processor] nvarchar(4000),
	[warranty] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Refined/2023/03/25/mobiles.csv_20230325.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [data_mssistoragegen2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.teams (
	[team] nvarchar(4000),
	[twitter] nvarchar(4000),
	[url] nvarchar(4000),
	[ncaa_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[stats_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[private] nvarchar(4000),
	[team_state] nvarchar(4000),
	[conference] nvarchar(4000),
	[division] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Refined/2023/03/25/teams.csv_20230325.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [data_mssistoragegen2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.Tomatoprices (
	[Date] nvarchar(4000),
	[Unit] nvarchar(4000),
	[Minimum] nvarchar(4000),
	[Maximum] nvarchar(4000),
	[Average] nvarchar(4000),
	[Market] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Refined/2023/03/25/Tomatoprices.csv_20230325.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [data_mssistoragegen2_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME NOT IN ('database_firewall_rules','BuildVersion','ErrorLog')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
'@{pipeline().DataFactory}' AS DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' AS PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' AS PipelineRunId,
'@{activity('act_copy_sqldb').output.rowsRead}' AS SourceRowCount,
'@{activity('act_copy_sqldb').output.rowsCopied}' AS RawRowCount,
'@{if(equals(activity('act_copy_sqldb').output.RowsRead, activity('act_copy_sqldb').output.RowsCopied),'Succeeded','Failed')}' AS AuditStatus

activities.name: act_execute_raw_to_refined
activities.description: Executing pl_adventureworks_raw_to_refined pipeline for raw to refined process

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT DISTINCT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA='@{pipeline().parameters.db_schema}'
SELECT CustomerID, FirstName, LastName,DateOfBirth,  NULL AS Email,  NULL AS PhoneNumber FROM [PnC].[Customers]

SELECT
'@{pipeline().DataFactory}' AS DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' AS PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' AS PipelineRunId,
'@{activity('act_copy_customers_table').output.rowsRead}' AS SourceRowCount,
'@{activity('act_copy_customers_table').output.rowsCopied}' AS RawRowCount,
'@{if(equals(activity('act_copy_customers_table').output.rowsRead, activity('act_copy_customers_table').output.rowsCopied), 'Succeeded', 'Failed')}' AS AuditStatus

audit_folder.value: @concat('Audits/', pipeline().parameters.source_system_name, '/', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyy/'), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'MM/'), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'dd/'))

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
'@{pipeline().DataFactory}' AS DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' AS PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' AS PipelineRunId,
'@{activity('act_copy_tables').output.rowsRead}' AS SourceRowCount,
'@{activity('act_copy_tables').output.rowsCopied}' AS RawRowCount,
'@{if(equals(activity('act_copy_tables').output.rowsRead, activity('act_copy_tables').output.rowsCopied), 'Succeeded', 'Failed')}' AS AuditStatus

audit_folder.value: @concat('Audits/', pipeline().parameters.source_system_name, '/', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyy/'), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'MM/'), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'dd/'))

value.value: @concat('Raw/',pipeline().parameters.source_system_name, '/', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyy/'), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'MM/'), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'dd/'))

@concat('Refined/',pipeline().parameters.source_system_name, '/', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyy/'), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'MM/'), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'dd/'))

wildcardFolderPath.value: @concat('Audits/', pipeline().parameters.source_system_name, '/', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyy/'), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'MM/'), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'dd/'))

Audit_Folder.value: @concat('Audits/', pipeline().parameters.source_system_name, '/', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyy/'), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'MM/'), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'dd/'))

@concat('Audits/', pipeline().parameters.source_system_name, '/', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyy/'), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'MM/'), formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(pipeline().TriggerTime, 'UTC', 'Eastern Standard Time'), 'dd/'))

activities.name: act_foreach_s3_to_raw
activities.description: This activity will iterate and copy each file from s3 and load into adls

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
'@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{concat(item().FileName)}' as FileName,
'@{activity('act_copy_files_s3_to_raw').output.dataRead}' as SourceCount,
'@{activity('act_copy_files_s3_to_raw').output.dataWritten}' as RawCount,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunID,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as ExecutionDate,
'@{activity('act_copy_files_s3_to_raw').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus

ifFalseActivities.name: Fail
ifFalseActivities.description: This will puposefully fail the pipeline if the summary file is not seen in s3

typeProperties.message: Summary File is missing in S3
typeProperties.errorCode: Summary File is missing in S3, please check and rerun the pipeline

ifTrueActivities.name: act_copy_summary_file
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity will copy the summary file from s3 bucket to azure storage account
